forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny to partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by some light rain later at night. Low 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and light rain after midnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 56F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 13C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low 7C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the evening, then clouds lingering overnight. Low around 45F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High around 60F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds late. Low 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few passing clouds, otherwise generally sunny. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 61F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 10C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
